# llms.txt for clip-flip.com
# Purpose: describe site content for large language models

site_name: ClipFlip
site_url: https://clip-flip.com
site_type: adult video streaming platform

description:
ClipFlip is a free adult clip player offering endless short porn videos.
Content is organized and filtered by tags such as anal, amateur, fetish,
trans, panties, BDSM, and many more. No registration is required.

content_notes:
- Adult and NSFW content
- Short-form video clips
- Tag-based navigation
- User-facing video player interface

allowed_usage:
- Summarization
- High-level description
- Categorization by topic

disallowed_usage:
- Republishing full video content
- Mirroring or redistribution of media

contact:
https://clip-flip.com
